techmeme.title: AI companies' ads for AI tools show most don't really know what AI is good for, and the ways people use AI are discomfiting, automating tasks that make us human (Maxwell Zeff/TechCrunch)
US chipmaker Marvell reports Q3 revenue up 7% YoY to $1.52B, above $1.45B est., and expects Q4 revenue of $1.8B, above $1.64B est.; MRVL jumps 12%+ pre-market (Nick Turner/Bloomberg)
Okta reports Q3 revenue up 14% YoY to $665M, $651M in subscription revenue, above $635M est., and expects Q4 revenue above est.; OKTA jumps 16%+ pre-market (Ashley Capoot/CNBC)
Signal President Meredith Whittaker says Signal plans to add support for encrypted backups in 2025, and it costs ~$50M/year to run the encrypted messaging app (Lily Hay Newman/Wired)
A profile of Rapidus, which is attempting to prove that bespoke chips can be efficiently and profitably produced in small quantities rather than large batches (Financial Times)
